dialogue.htmlContent:
The tunnels of Submission have an ominous feel to them at the best of times, but as you make your way down the dirty, deserted passageways, you're filled with a particular sense of dread, as though something terrible is about to happen.

At first, the sinister silence that permeates these gloomy catacombs is broken only by the rustling of litter that you disturb underfoot, but as you travel ever onwards, you start hearing faint sounds of movement coming from somewhere far behind you. Realising that you're being followed, and not wanting to be inadvertently shepherded into a trap that might be lying up ahead, you stand your ground and turn to face the direction of your pursuers.

After just a moment, you catch sight of the ones that have been following you, as from around the far corner, there appear the forms of four imps. One of these is larger than the others, and, although [npc.her] wings look large enough to sustain flight, [npc.sheIs] choosing to walk upon the ground, while the other three, smaller imps, are fluttering along in the air a short way behind.

All four of the imps are dressed in skimpy rags, and, perhaps due to the fact that they appear more comfortable flying around than walking, you notice that the three smaller imps lack any form of footwear. What catches your attention the most, however, is that the alpha-imp is armed with what looks to be an arcane-enchanted staff, and is wearing a rather ragged-looking #IF npc.isFeminine() #THEN witch's hat. #ELSE wizard's hat. #ENDIF

As [npc.she] catches sight of you, the alpha-imp stops in [npc.her] tracks. Obviously being the leader of this gang, [npc.she] steps forwards and sizes you up, before declaring, in a rather high-pitched voice, [npc.speech(Hah! What mere mortal dares to stand before my arcane power! You'll pay dearly for trespassing on our territory!)]

The three smaller imps flutter forwards to back their leader up, and [npc3.name] sneers, [npc3.speech([pc.Insult]! You're gonna get a taste of [npc.her] spells now!)]

Taking this opportunity to throw [npc4.her] own insult your way, [npc4.name] cruelly spits, [npc4.speech(That's right, [pc.insult]! And once you're grovellin' before us, we're gonna fuck you real good! I'm gonna love hearin' you squeal!)]

It's quite clear that these imps are only interested in one thing, and as they start to advance, the third imp, who up until now had been quite content to simply sneer and scowl at you, puts any doubts as to their intentions to rest, as [npc2.she] calls out, #IF properties.getForcedTFTendency()==FORCED_TF_MASCULINE || properties.getForcedTFTendency()==FORCED_TF_MASCULINE_HEAVY #THEN [npc2.speech(I've been savin' a potion for someone just like you! Ooh, I'm lookin' forwards to turnin' you into our hunky herm! Gonna give you a nice wet cunt and a big, thick cock!)] #ELSE [npc2.speech(I've been savin' a potion for someone just like you! Ooh, I'm lookin' forwards to turnin' you into our sexy futa fuck-toy!)] #ENDIF

Cowed by the imps' cruel insults and aggressive posturing, you decide that the best course of action would be to just give the gang what they want. Stepping back, you hold up your [pc.hands] as you submit. [pc.speech(Please, there's no need for violence. You just want sex, right?)]

[npc.speech(So, the [pc.insult] knows [pc.her] place!)] [npc.name] snarls, before turning [npc.her] head and ordering [npc.her] subordinates to subdue you, [npc.speech(Get [pc.herHim] down, quick!)]

Two of the smaller imps immediately dart forwards, and, flying up to each side of you, they grab your [pc.arms], before folding their wings behind their backs and using their weight to pull you down onto your knees. As you hit the floor, you look up to see [npc.name] and [npc2.name] stepping forwards, grinning in delight as they see that you're not going to put up a fight.

#IF pc.isAbleToAccessCoverableArea(CA_MOUTH, true) #THEN

[npc.speech(Give me the potion,)] [npc.name] commands [npc.her] partner. Quickly producing a bottle of strange liquid, [npc2.name] hands it over to her superior, who immediately pulls the stopper out and steps forwards, before grabbing your chin and squeezing your cheeks. #IF properties.getForcedTFTendency()==FORCED_TF_MASCULINE || properties.getForcedTFTendency()==FORCED_TF_MASCULINE_HEAVY #THEN [npc.speech(Open wide, [pc.insult]! This'll turn you into our manly stud, before giving you a nice big cock and sopping wet cunt, so you'll have all the parts we need to have our fun!)] #ELSE [npc.speech(Open wide, [pc.insult]! This'll turn you into one sexy bitch, before giving you a nice big cock and sopping wet cunt, so you'll have all the parts we need to have our fun!)] #ENDIF

With no further warning, and not even giving you time to do as [npc.she] commands, [npc.name] shoves the bottle past your [pc.lips], and you feel the warm, sickly-sweet liquid entering your mouth...

#ELSE

[npc.speech(This [pc.insult]'s got [pc.her] mouth blocked! If only the boss was here, she could get rid of that seal enchantment! Eugh!)] [npc.name] spits in disgust. Turning to [npc.her] subordinate, [npc.she] snaps, [npc.speech(Save that potion for the next one we catch! Let's just fuck whatever holes we can with this [pc.insult].)]

With no further warning, [npc.name] reaches forwards and grabs the back of your head, before pushing you down onto the floor. [npc.speech(Get down, [pc.insult]! Time to be a good fuck-toy for us!)]

#ENDIF
Having enslaved all of the imps, there's nothing left for you to do except continue on your way through the tunnels...

[npc.speech(What are you doing?!)] [npc.name] screeches in alarm, [npc.speech(You can't enslave us! Stop it!)]

Grinning at the remaining imps before you, you wonder whether you should continue with your task of enslaving them, or leave them be...

[npc.speech(Stop it!)] [npc.name] scream, [npc.speech(Don't do it! I don't want to be a slave!)]

Grinning at this last defeated imp, you wonder whether you should enslaving [npc.herHim] as well, or leave [npc.herHim] be...

Your last opponent collapses to the ground at your feet, and you find yourself looking down at the gang of defeated imps with a relieved smile on your face. Despite their superior numbers, they proved to be no match for your might, and now that you've proven yourself in battle, you wonder what you should do about these trouble-makers.

Considering how many imps there are infesting these tunnels, you know that the chances of encountering these particular foes again are slim-to-none, so if you wanted to do anything with them, now's the time. If nothing else, perhaps you could appropriate the transformation potion that these imps were planning to use on you?

#IF(game.getNonCompanionCharactersPresent().size()==1)

You aren't interested in doing anything more to this last defeated [npc.race], and, standing to one side, you command, [pc.speech(Go on, get out of here, and don't come back!)]

Groaning as [npc.she] pushes [npc.herself] to [npc.her] feet, the [npc.race] does as you say, and staggers off deeper into the tunnels of Submission. After watching [npc.herHim] leave, you prepare to continue on your way...

#ELSE

You aren't interested in doing anything more to the imps, and, standing to one side, you command, [pc.speech(Go on, get out of here, all of you! And don't come back!)]

Groaning as they push themselves to their feet, the imps do as you say, and stagger off deeper into the tunnels of Submission. After watching them leave, you prepare to continue on your way...

#ENDIF

#IF(game.getNonCompanionCharactersPresent().size()==1)
